channel.title: How to block / ignore a track on SC?
channel.description:
Is there any way to block or ignore a track on SC?
I keep getting certain tracks popping up in the 'Next up' that I don't want to hear. (I've not liked them and I don't follow those who made them. I always skip/stop it, but SC's not smart enough to take the hint.)
I'm wondering if blocking the artist will work, but it seems like a sledgehammer/walnut thing to do.

item.title: How to block / ignore a track on SC?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Fwiw, just posted the question on the SC community board.

I’ll feedback here if anyone mentions a solution.

 
(Aaargh. It’s up next after every track I choose to play. It’s killing SC for me [as a listener])

Read full topic
item.source: How to block / ignore a track on SC?

item.title: How to block / ignore a track on SC?
item.dc:creator: Aqzi
item.description:
This often happens to me as well. I often get “recommended artists” off newgrounds/geometry dash because I liked 1 track a year ago… Looking for a solution to this as well.

Read full topic
item.source: How to block / ignore a track on SC?
